sequence:
After the Rain Comes the Sun

<size=45>Chapter 1 - Tomorrow's Weather Is...</size>

scripts.say: It was a day like any other - My secretary ship, Yamashiro, and I were taking care of some work.
Here's the next document... Woah! It slipped through my fingers again... Um, I'll go pick it up right now... Huh?
Ah! Milord, didn't you ask me to seal this document for you earlier this morning? *pouts* Milord, you've been spacing out a lot recently...
You're not pushing yourself too hard, are you? Fusou is really worried about you...
Right... I did ask you to do that for me...
By the way, Milord! Take a look at this! It's super convenient!
With excitement in her voice, Yamashiro pulled out a smartphone.

Technology advances super quickly, doesn't it! Shigure told me that thirty years ago, there weren't even televisions around. She said families had to huddle around radios. After the Sirens attacked, everything has developed so fast!
It's way too fast...? Hmm... I don't really get it, but... I can do a ton of stuff with this, so it's probably fine!
Let's see what tomorrow's weather is like... Um, hit confirm... Okay! See, now I won't even need to leave a memo!
Yamashiro held her smartphone out towards me, showing me the screen.
Remember how you promised that you'd help me clean the shrine last time? Well, tomorrow's a holiday, so I'll be counting on your help!
